channel.title: Problem getting started on Windows 8.1 ("not accesseable : driver not installed")
channel.description:
Hy, just got my Axoloti today and so I want to play around with it now :smile:
I downloaded & ran the installer, unzipped the runtime_bundle as described and then plugged in the board.
Images: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/co6i0h3ilzt2g8j/AAAzoiQSn8BZvwVHcM3FziF1a?dl=0 ( sorry for this, but the forum doesn't let my put individual image-links in here because i'm a new user)
It seems to be installed fine: (see image 01)
However, in the Axoloti Application I cannot connect: see images 02-03
I saw some fix via ZDiag in some other thread, however this seems fine to me already: see image 04
Any hints? I'm a little stuck

item.title: Problem getting started on Windows 8.1 ("not accesseable : driver not installed")
item.dc:creator: @NoUsernameFound Paul
item.description:
@NoUsernameFound wrote:

You are completely correct I could have sworn that I tried that already -> turns out I didn't. My Axoloti is already beeping happily

Thank you so much!

Read full topic
item.source: Problem getting started on Windows 8.1 ("not accesseable : driver not installed")

item.title: Problem getting started on Windows 8.1 ("not accesseable : driver not installed")
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

You're close and it is really the same issue as in the other thread. Choose "install driver" in Zadig, not downgrade WCID or something else. Only boards that shipped before Monday suffer this firmware issue, and will not happen again after flashing. Sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem getting started on Windows 8.1 ("not accesseable : driver not installed")
